main event: A witness observed a bright, incandescent object in the sky over Ontario, California for 15-20 minutes on November 28, 1968.
interesting points: The object appeared as bright as the planet Jupiter and pulsed or flashed rapidly.
The object seemed to outmaneuver aircraft that approached it.
The object changed altitude suddenly, going up and then returning to its original position.
The witness had seen 21 other UFO sightings in the past 5 years, though all were different.
Aircraft were in the area and seemed to dive at the object before pulling up.
